price: ߊ߬ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߞߵߊ߬ ߞߟߌ߫ ߕߏߥߊ߫ ߝߙߊ߬ ߛߊߣߌ߲ ߘߟߊ߫ ߕߎ߬ߡߊ ߡߍ߲
arabic: إِذۡ نَادَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ بِٱلۡوَادِ ٱلۡمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: idh nādāhu rabbuhu bil-wādi al-muqadasi ṭuwan
